sentences.sContent: His wet shirt clung to his body.
sentences.sCn: 他的湿衬衫紧紧地贴在身上。

sentences.sContent: After her mother's death, Sara clung to her aunt more than ever.
sentences.sCn: 萨拉在母亲去世后比以往任何时候都更依附于她的姨妈。

sentences.sContent: Throughout the trial she had clung to the belief that he was innocent.
sentences.sCn: 在整个审判中，她都坚持相信他是清白的。

exam.question: At the party we found the shy girl ______ her mother all the time.

answer.explain: 句意： 在晚会上， 我们发现那个腼腆的姑娘一直缠着她母亲。depend on： 依赖， 依靠； coincide with： 相符， 与…一致； adhere to： 黏附， 坚持。

trans.tranOther: to stick to someone or something, or seem to surround them
